type.description: The namespace and ID of the particle type.
type.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the particle type.

params.description: The additional parameter for the particle type.
params.markdownDescription: The additional parameter for the particle type.

type.description:
[Data Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/data_types/particle_effect)

A data type that's either a [String](string.md) which defines only the particle type or an [Object](object.md) which defines the particle type and its additional parameters.


!!! note

    Refer to the [Minecraft Wiki: Particles (Particle IDs)](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Particles#Particle_IDs) page for a list of **vanilla** particle type IDs that you can use.
type.markdownDescription:
[Data Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/data_types/particle_effect)

A data type that's either a [String](string.md) which defines only the particle type or an [Object](object.md) which defines the particle type and its additional parameters.


!!! note

    Refer to the [Minecraft Wiki: Particles (Particle IDs)](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Particles#Particle_IDs) page for a list of **vanilla** particle type IDs that you can use.
